control_attributes.control_description: The information system produces a system-wide (logical or physical) audit trail composed of audit records in a standardized format.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization prohibits the direct connection of an [Assignment: organization-defined unclassified, national security system] to an external network without the use of [Assignment: organization-defined boundary protection device].

Control Statement: The information system produces a system-wide (logical or physical) audit trail composed of audit records in a standardized format.
